hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BOOTSTRAP_SCRIPT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Python script that reserves machines from Duffy and executes the provisioning and test scripts on them.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GANESHA_SETUP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provisioning script for the NFS-Ganesha server.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NFS_CLIENT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Script that configures the client and runs the test.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: GERRIT_HOST
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Gerrit instance hosting the git repository.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: GERRIT_PROJECT
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Gerrit project of the git repository.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GERRIT_REFSPEC
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
For review number 12345 and patch set 6, add:
refs/changes/45/12345/6
45 being last two digits of review number.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: # no need for verbose output # download and run the bootstrap script curl -o bootstrap.py ${BOOTSTRAP_SCRIPT} python bootstrap.py
